links.name: Bliss
links.description: Tranquilizing narcotic. Inhalation, Injection. 3 seconds. Duration 6-Body hours. -1 Reaction, +1 tresholds, -1 all limits. Pain tolerance 3

links.name: Cram
links.description: Ingestion, inhalation. 10 minutes. Duration 12-Body hours. Psychological. +1 reaction, +1d6 iniciative. Stimulant. Takes 6 Stun after war off

links.name: Deepweed
links.description: Ingestion, Inhalation. Immediate speed. Duration 6 - body hours. Physiological. Forbidden. +1 Willpower, +1 mental limit, -1 Physical limi, forces astral perceive. Wear off -1 all dice and -1 all limits.

links.name: Jazz
links.description: Inhalation. Immediate. Duration 10  x 1d6 minutes. +1 Reaction. +1 P limit. +2d6 initiative. stimulante. Disorientation on wear off.

links.name: Kamikaze
links.description: Inhalation, Immediate, 10x1d6 minutes. Physiological, +1 Body, +1 Agility, +2 Strength, +1 willpower, +2 P limit, +2d6 dice, High pain tolerance.-1 Reaction, -1 Willpower, -2 to all limits on wear off. 6 stun damage.

links.name: Long Haul
links.description: Injection. 10 minutes. Duration 4 days. Psychological. Aliviates need for sleep. Wear off passes out and sleeps for 8d6 hours. Afterwards disroientation. Second dose additional 1d6/2 days, then 10 stun damage and crash.

links.name: Nitro
links.description: Inhalation, 3 seconds, 10 x 1d6 minutes duration, +2 STR, +2 Will, +2 PER, +2 P Limit, High pain tolerance. Wear off -2 all limits and 9 stun damage

links.name: Novacoke
links.description: Inhalation, injection. 3 seconds. 10-Body hours. +1 reaction, +1 charisma, +1 PER, +1 Social limit, High Pain tolerance 1. Cha and Will -1

links.name: Psyche
links.description: Ingestion, 10 minutes. Duration 12-Body hours. +1 INT, +1 Logic, +1 mental limit. Hyper-aware and detached.

links.name: Zen
links.description: Inhalation, 5 minutes. 10 x 1d6 minutes duration. -2 Reac, +1 Will, -1 Physical action pool. Hallucinogen.
